tool_description: Evaluates fire risks associated with heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems.

hvac_system_type.description: Primary HVAC system type (forced air, radiant, steam, etc.)

ductwork_material.description: Main ductwork material (metal, flexible, fiberglass, etc.)

fire_dampers_present.description: Presence of fire dampers in ductwork

system_age_years.description: Age of HVAC system in years

error_messages: Invalid HVAC type: Use standard types (forced air, radiant, steam, chilled water, heat pump, geothermal).
Unknown ductwork material: Specify material (galvanized steel, aluminum, flexible, fiberglass, fabric).
System age error: Age must be between 0 and 50 years for realistic HVAC systems.
Invalid maintenance frequency: Use monthly, quarterly, annually, or irregular.
usage: Provide hvac_system_type, ductwork_material, fire_dampers_present, and system_age_years. Specify maintenance_frequency for more accurate risk assessment.

smoke_spread_risk.description: Risk of smoke spread through HVAC (low, moderate, high)
